function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of clarity on the influence of relative humidity on influenza virus survival and seasonality","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lower rh leading to longer suspension of droplets and deposition in lower respiratory tract","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effects of evaporation on chemistry of droplets affecting virus stability","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Droplet size determining suspension time in air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deposition of droplets in respiratory system","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Equilibrium size of respiratory droplets may affect the spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of relative humidity rh on droplet size may influence the transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty around the effect of temperature on virus stability and survival","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of incomplete evaporation of respiratory droplets in the environment","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of indoor data on humidity and influenza transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on outdoor measures of temperature and humidity","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient time for environmental conditions to affect the viability of viruses in released aerosols","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in extrapolating results from animal model influenza transmission studies to humans","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain relationship between virus survival and environmental factors","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent transmission results in animal models","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid forced airflow rates affecting virus exposure time","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influenza virus survival prediction may be inaccurate due to different models and variable parameters.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistencies in the impact of rh, temperature, and ah on virus survival may lead to misinterpretation of risk factors.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Caution against drawing conclusions about virus survival under real-world conditions based on laboratory-based studies.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conflicting results between current study and previous studies regarding the impact of absolute humidity on influenza virus survival","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlation between temperature and ah impacting viability prediction","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate assessment of virus viability","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor fit at higher temperatures","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slight curvature in the relationship with ah","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rh alone is a poor predictor of viability","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influenza virus stability is compromised at higher temperatures","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlated independent variables in linear regression models can lead to inflated variances of estimated coefficients and inaccurate predictions","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nonlinear relationship between virus viability and absolute humidity ah","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Thermal denaturation of proteins and nucleic acids as mechanisms of virus inactivation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effect of humidity on survival of viruses","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disparities in results due to differences in suspension media for virus studies","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of temperature and humidity on virus survival","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thermal degradation of influenza virus in various systems aerosols, droplets, surfaces, etc.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate parametrization of the relationship between relative humidity rh and droplet size could lead to misinterpretation of aerosol behavior and transmission dynamics.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hierarchy of infection control in indoor environments","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor air ventilation in buildings","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of new disease conditions by building systems","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation in sewage systems","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aerosols containing pathogens can be inhalable and remain viable for hours","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Subjects with weak immune systems at risk of symptomatic infection, including those undergoing immunosuppressive therapy and those with excessive workload or irregular sleep patterns.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission routes of sars-cov-2 include direct contact, droplet deposition on surfaces and people, and airborne cross-infection through exhaled air.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Severe symptomatology more frequent in elderly subjects, people with concomitant pathologies, and young subjects with weak immune systems","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased immune defense due to excessive workload and irregular circadian sleep-wake rhythm","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmissibility and entry of sars-cov-2 through access routes such as oral cavity, nasal cavity, eyes, and mucous membranes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unauthorized access to restricted content","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data loss or corruption during download","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of suitable ventilation system for infection control","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of fire safety features for a makeshift hospital","category":"Safety","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate space for fundamental and auxiliary medical and nonmedical operations","category":"Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective health and safety management for facility users","category":"Safety","confidence":"Medium"}]}
